title: How to Make Chocolate Rough Slice

steps.headline: Combine sugar, flour, baking powder, coconut, and cocoa in a bowl.
Pour in the melted butter and work into the flour mixture with the fork.
Put the mixture into the lined baking pan.
steps.description: Press down with the fork to spread evenly across the pan.

steps.headline: Place in the oven and bake for 15 minutes.
steps.description: The slice is ready when it is puffy and slightly browned at the edges.

steps.headline: Remove from the oven and set the pan on a wire cooling rack.
steps.description: Remove the slice after about 10 minutes of cooling. Ice (frost) if wished, or serve as is.

text: Preheat the oven to 150ºC /300ºF.  Combine sugar, flour, baking powder, coconut, and cocoa in a bowl.  Pour in the melted butter and work into the flour mixture with the fork.  Put the mixture into the lined baking pan. Press down with the fork to spread evenly across the pan. Place in the oven and bake for 15 minutes. The slice is ready when it is puffy and slightly browned at the edges. Remove from the oven and set the pan on a wire cooling rack. Remove the slice after about 10 minutes of cooling. Ice (frost) if wished, or serve as is. Finished.
